attributes.action: Stop the Banning of Christian symbols in the workplace
attributes.additional_details:
The Government has a duty to uphold the rights of ALL Christians above those of "Other" religions, irrespective of the dictates of Europe and wants of minoritys
'In God We Trust' is our National Motto. We adopted it because Christians on Christian principles founded this nation. It is certainly appropriate to display a symbol of Christianity on our person or elsewhere.
